title: Heera Jhumka: Polki Diamond Teardrop Earring
features: This exquisite earring features a classic Jhumka silhouette, reimagined with a modern openwork teardrop design. The top section showcases a cluster of rose-cut Polki diamonds, each uniquely shaped and arranged to maximize their natural brilliance. Below, a delicate gold frame, adorned with brilliant-cut diamonds, surrounds a large, central Polki diamond in a triangular shape, creating a mesmerizing focal point. The openwork grid design adds a contemporary touch while maintaining a traditional feel. Hyderabadi polish adds a unique luster and protection to the gold.
colors: Predominantly gold with the icy white sparkle of Polki and brilliant-cut diamonds.
occasions: and special occasions where a touch of heritage and glamour is desired. Suitable for traditional Telugu ceremonies like muhurtham
or any grand celebration where you want to make a statement.
description: This 'Heera Jhumka' perfectly blends traditional South Indian design with modern aesthetics. The use of rose-cut Polki diamonds, with their unique charm and natural imperfections, adds a touch of antique elegance. The intricate openwork design showcases exceptional craftsmanship and allows light to play beautifully across the diamonds. This piece is not only a stunning accessory but also a valuable heirloom to be cherished for generations.
